detaileddescription.para: Initialize the barrier for shell synchronization routines. The number of threads to wait for is given as parameter.
GetShellContext : manages pthread_keys.

Initialize the shell. The command line for the shell is given as parameter.
input_file
the file to read from (NULL if stdin).

memberdef.argsstring: (shell_state_t *context, char *s, int n, FILE *stream, int interactive)
memberdef.name: shell_readline

detaileddescription.para: Run the interpreter.
shell_ParseLine: Extract an arglist from a command line.

parameterdescription.para: The list of command line tokens.
The number of command line tokens.

detaileddescription.para:
remove escape sequence
0 if OK, Error code else (missing closing quote...)

remove string quotes
0 if OK, Error code else (missing closing quote...)
shell_SolveArgs: Interprets arguments if they are vars or commands.

parameterdescription.para: The number of command line tokens.
The list of command line tokens (modified).
Indicates which tokens must be freed.

detaileddescription.para: shell_CleanArgs: Free allocated arguments.

parameterdescription.para: The number of command line tokens.
The list of command line tokens (modified).
Indicates which tokens must be freed.

detaileddescription.para: shell_Execute: Commands dispatcher.

parameterdescription.para: The number of arguments of this command.
The output stream of this command.

simplesect.para: The returned status of this command.

detaileddescription.para: shell_PrintError: Prints an error.
shell_PrintTrace: Prints a verbose trace.

shell_SetLayer: Set the current active layer.
0 if OK. else, an error code.
shell_GetLayer: Retrieves the current active layer (internal use).
shell_SetStatus Set the special variables $? and $STATUS.
shell_GetStatus Get the special variables $? or $STATUS (internal use).
shell_SetVerbose Set the special variable $VERBOSE.
shell_GetVerbose Get the special variable $VERBOSE (internal use).
shell_SetDbgLvl Set the special variables $DEBUG_LEVEL and $DBG_LVL
shell_GetDbgLvl Get the special variable $DEBUG_LEVEL and $DBG_LVL (internal use).
shell_SetInput Set the input for reading commands and set the value of $INPUT and $INTERACTIVE.

parameterdescription.para: a script file or NULL for reading from stdin.

detaileddescription.para: shell_GetInputStream Get the input stream for reading commands (internal use).
shell_SetPrompt Set the special variable $PROMPT
shell_GetPrompt Get the special variable $PROMPT
shell_SetShellId Set the special variable $SHELLID
shell_SetLine Set the special variable $LINE
shell_GetLine Get the special variable $LINE
